cast.overview: An ex-thief is accused of enacting a new crime spree, so to clear his name he sets off to catch the new thief, who’s imitating his signature style.
cast.title: To Catch a Thief

details.biography:
Brigitte Auber (born April 27, 1925) is a French actress who has worked extensively on film and TV in Europe, but is little-known in the United States.  Her best known role, and a rare English-speaking part, was opposite Cary Grant in Alfred Hitchcock's To Catch a Thief, released in 1955.  Ms. Auber had a small role in the 1998 remake of The Man in the Iron Mask (which starred Leonardo DiCaprio).

Description above from the Wikipedia article Brigitte Auber, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
details.name: Brigitte Auber
